QuestData.Title: Rockbiter Weapon
QuestData.Description: I am but an apprentice myself, $n, but I can still impart a lesson to you in thanks.$B$BAllow me to teach you how to draw upon the spirits of earth, and imbue your weapon with elemental power.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Miira Thunderhoof and learn Rockbiter Weapon.
